00019 #ifndef __INET_PROTOCOLMAP_H
00020 #define __INET_PROTOCOLMAP_H
00021 
00022 #include <vector>
00023 #include "INETDefs.h"
00024 
00028 class INET_API ProtocolMapping
00029 {
00030   protected:
00031     struct Entry
00032     {
00033         int protocolNumber;
00034         int outGateIndex;
00035     };
00036     // we use vector because it's probably faster: we'll hit 1st or 2nd entry
00037     // (TCP or UDP) in 90% of cases
00038     typedef std::vector<Entry> Entries;
00039     Entries entries;
00040 
00041   public:
00042     ProtocolMapping() {}
00043     ~ProtocolMapping() {}
00044     void parseProtocolMapping(const char *s);
00045     int getOutputGateForProtocol(int protocol);
00046 };
